00024 typedef enum MTKt_FileType {       /* File type */
00025   MTK_AGP,
00026   MTK_GP_GMP,
00027   MTK_GRP_RCCM,
00028   MTK_GRP_ELLIPSOID_GM,
00029   MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM,
00030   MTK_GRP_ELLIPSOID_LM,
00031   MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM,
00032   MTK_AS_AEROSOL,
00033   MTK_AS_LAND,
00034   MTK_TC_ALBEDO,
00035   MTK_TC_CLASSIFIERS,
00036   MTK_TC_STEREO,
00037   MTK_PP,
00038   MTK_CONVENTIONAL,
00039   MTK_UNKNOWN,
00040   MTK_TC_CLOUD,
00041 } MTKt_FileType;

00044                               "GRP_ELLIPSOID_GM", "GRP_TERRAIN_GM", \

00051 typedef struct MtkCoreMetaData {
00052   union {
00053     char **s; /* Array of strings */
00054     int *i; /* Array of integers */
00055     double *d; /* Array of doubles */
00056   } data;
00057   int num_values;
00058   enum {
00059     MTKMETA_CHAR,
00060     MTKMETA_INT,
00061     MTKMETA_DOUBLE
00062   } datatype;
00063   void *dataptr;                /* Pointer data buffer */
00064 } MtkCoreMetaData;
00065 
00066 #define MTK_CORE_METADATA_INIT { {NULL}, 0, MTKMETA_CHAR, NULL }
00067 
00068 #define NGRIDCELL 2
00069 
00071 typedef struct MTKt_TimeMetaData {
00072   MTKt_int32 path;
00073   MTKt_int32 start_block;
00074   MTKt_int32 end_block;
00075   MTKt_char8 camera[3];
00076   MTKt_int32 number_transform[NBLOCK + 1];
00077   MTKt_char8 ref_time[NBLOCK + 1][NGRIDCELL][MTKd_DATETIME_LEN];
00078   MTKt_int32 start_line[NBLOCK + 1][NGRIDCELL];
00079   MTKt_int32 number_line[NBLOCK + 1][NGRIDCELL];
00080   MTKt_double coeff_line[NBLOCK + 1][6][NGRIDCELL];
00081   MTKt_double som_ctr_x[NBLOCK + 1][NGRIDCELL]; 
00082   MTKt_double som_ctr_y[NBLOCK + 1][NGRIDCELL]; 
00083 } MTKt_TimeMetaData;
00084

00086                                  {{{0.0}}}, {{0.0}}, {{0.0}} }
